article: This is a photo  _  a classroom. It's a big room. In the photo, you can see a table, some  desks and chairs  . You can see a teacher and two students ,  _  Three  _  are on the table. A pencil case is on the desk. Two pens and two rulers are in  the  pencil case. A schoolbag  _  behind a chair. The lady is the Chinese teacher. Her name is  Wang Ying  . One student is Jack. He is 12. The other student is Mike.  _  is 11. They are in Class 8. They're good  _  .  _  math teacher is Mr. Brown. He is not here.
